title: PBE Help
body: I just got onto the PBE last night and i was told i have to wait to get lvl 30.....so i was able to get on today and i was lvl 30 but i was only give 500RP and 10k IP so im unable to buy runes and such....can anyone help??

replies.body:
We should be able to help you if you submit a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
yeah i ended up putting one in
